name: Thief (itch)
description:
In Thief you play as a rouge attempting to steal as much treasure as possible. Make your way around guards as you take all of their treasure, but be wary, the more treasure you take, the slower you'll become. Not only this, but the longer you stay alive,  the more guards will show up to look for you. 

Use W,A,S,D or arrow keys to move.
